description.value:
You gain one of the following powers of your choice. This new power replaces the daily attack power you gained at 5th level.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.9ZTCc7ViK8AqowtS]{Memory of Blades}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ZjunAkNbxPMDY8SK]{Nightshade Cloud}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ABx7fGJm5uDoMjqg]{Rain of Lead}
